{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3263514,"name":"Josiah","username":"bakedPotatoLord","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/bakedpotatolord/{size}/207771_2.png","created_at":"2023-12-11T19:44:37.533Z","cooked":"

Hey there, I’m Josiah, software team lead of 7243, a mid-tier team in Denver, and a WPILib contributor

I recently updated to WPILIB v “2024.1.1-beta-3” so that I could be on the current VScode release, and install other VScode extensions. I figured out vendor libraries, only to get slapped in the face with this, as I tried to deploy robot code:

image1424×315 32.7 KB

I looked through all the docs, and since I’m working with a RIO 2.0, I started looking for a 2024 RIO Image. However, the imaging tool only had this:

I went to try to update my FRC game tools, and it appears that I’m still on the latest release.

image1343×36 1.78 KB

image906×661 14.3 KB

Idk if this should be a github issue, but I’m just unsure what to do next. Any help is greatly appreciated. Thanks!
